section.heading: Exemptions—Use of medical supplies, chemicals, or materials by comprehensive cancer centers

content.p: The provisions of this chapter do not apply in respect to the use of medical supplies, chemicals, or materials by a comprehensive cancer center. The exemption in this section does not apply to the use of construction materials, office equipment, building equipment, administrative supplies, or vehicles.

The definitions in RCW 82.04.4265 and 82.08.808 apply to this section. [ 2005 c 514 s 403 .] NOTES: Part headings not law — 2005 c 514: "Part headings used in this act are not any part of the law." [ 2005 c 514 s 1301 .] Severability — 2005 c 514: "If any provision of this act or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the remainder of the act or the application of the provision to other persons or circumstances is not affected." [ 2005 c 514 s 1309 .] Effective date — 2005 c 514 ss 401-403: See note following RCW 82.04.4265 .
